entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
